variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat endtime=stat("5material-droplet.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat endtimestep=stat("5material-droplet.stat")["dt"]["value"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat mindivergence=max(abs(stat("5material-droplet.stat")["Water"]["ControlVolumeDivergence"]["min"]))
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat maxdivergence=max(stat("5material-droplet.stat")["Water"]["ControlVolumeDivergence"]["max"])

import vtktools import fluidity.diagnostics.vtutools as vtutools from numpy import array as arr filelist = ["5material-droplet_10.pvtu", "5material-droplet_20.pvtu"]
pvtu = vtktools.vtu(filelist[0]) model, oldNodeIdToNew, oldCellIdToNew = vtutools.ModelVtuFromPvtu(pvtu)
serial_error = [] for f in range(len(filelist)): pvtu = vtktools.vtu(filelist[f]) vtup = vtutools.VtuFromPvtu(pvtu, model = model, oldNodeIdToNew = oldNodeIdToNew, oldCellIdToNew = oldCellIdToNew) vtus = vtktools.vtu("src/serial_vtus/"+filelist[f][:-5]+".vtu") vtud = vtktools.VtuDiff(vtus,vtup) names = vtud.GetFieldNames() serial_error.append([0,0,0]) for i in range(len(names)): if((vtud.GetFieldRank(names[i])==0)and(names[i]!="Water::Pressure")and(names[i]!="Water::Density")): field_error = max(abs(arr(vtud.GetScalarRange(names[i])))) print(names[i], field_error) serial_error[f][0] = max(serial_error[f][0], field_error) if((vtud.GetFieldRank(names[i])==0)and(names[i]=="Water::Pressure")): field_error = max(abs(arr(vtud.GetScalarRange(names[i])))) print(names[i], field_error) serial_error[f][1] = max(serial_error[f][1], field_error) if((vtud.GetFieldRank(names[i])==0)and(names[i]=="Water::Density")): field_error = max(abs(arr(vtud.GetScalarRange(names[i])))) print(names[i], field_error) serial_error[f][2] = max(serial_error[f][2], field_error)

test.name: Solvers converged
check end time
check end timestep
check droplet volume fraction was conserved

pass_tests.test: print('conservation error = ', abs(vfracintdrop0-vfracintdrop)) assert abs(vfracintdrop0-vfracintdrop) < max(maxdivergence, mindivergence)

test.name: check water2 volume fraction was conserved

pass_tests.test: print('conservation error = ', abs(vfracintwater20-vfracintwater2)) assert abs(vfracintwater20-vfracintwater2) < max(maxdivergence, mindivergence)

test.name: check droplet2 volume fraction was conserved

pass_tests.test: print('conservation error = ', abs(vfracintdrop20-vfracintdrop2)) assert abs(vfracintdrop20-vfracintdrop2) < max(maxdivergence, mindivergence)

test.name: check that reasonable tolerance is being used to test conservation

pass_tests.test: print('divergence tolerance = ', max(maxdivergence, mindivergence)) assert max(maxdivergence, mindivergence) < 1.E-7

test.name: check minimum water volume fraction is 0.0
check maximum water volume fraction is 1.0
check minimum droplet volume fraction is 0.0
check maximum droplet volume fraction is 1.0
check minimum water2 volume fraction is 0.0
check maximum water2 volume fraction is 1.0
check minimum droplet2 volume fraction is 0.0
check maximum droplet2 volume fraction is 1.0
check minimum air volume fraction is 0.0
check maximum air volume fraction is 1.0
check minimum sum volume fraction is 0.0
check maximum sum volume fraction is 1.0
check error to serial in middle
check error to serial at end
check pressure error to serial in middle
check pressure error to serial at end
check density error to serial in middle
check density error to serial at end
